content: 1 & 2 a total of 14 16 18 round 3-15 *k1 p1* repeat to end of round times you will end with a total of 28 32 36 row on your heel flap leg tip the easiest way to count your repeats see charts on pg 5-6 is to count the floats on the back side of the heel flap round 1-4 k to eor round 5 k 1 3 2 *p2 k4* 3 3 4 more heel turn times p2 k 29 35 38 round 6 k 1 3 2 p2 2/2 lc 3 3 4 row 1 sl 1 k16 18 20 ssk k1 turn more times p2 k 29 35 38 row 2 sl 1 p7 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl 1 k to one st before gap ssk continue working in pattern until leg k1 turn has reached the desired length make a row 4 sl 1 p to one st before gap p2tog note of the pattern round that you end with p1 turn sample knit has 12 pattern repeats on the leg repeat row 3 and 4 until all sts have been worked you will have 18 20 22 sts let sstayhomesocks knitsiphappy2022 3 thispatternisforpersonaluseonly gusset rounded toe cut cc and start knitting with mc place round 1-3 k to eor stitch markers if required at the start and round 4 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of end of the instep sts instep k2tog k1 repeat once to eor 52 60 68 sts pick up an extra st on the ladder in the row round 5-6 k to eor below to close any gaps round 7 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of then pick up 14 16 18 gusset sts in the instep k2tog k1 repeat once to eor garter bumps 48 56 64 sts round 8 k to eor k across the heel sts 18 20 22 round 9 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of pick up 14 16 18 sts on the other side of instep k2tog k1 repeat once to eor the gusset in the garter bumps picking up 44 52 60 sts an extra st on the ladder on the row below round 10 k to eor to close any gaps round 11 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k1 repeat once to eor you are now ready to continue knitting in the 40 48 56 sts round round 12 k to eor round 13 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k1 repeat once to eor gusset decreases 36 44 52 sts round 14 k to eor round 1 k instep in pattern 28 32 36 round 15 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end k1 ssk k until 3 sts before instep sts of instep k2tog k1 repeat once to eor k2tog k1 32 40 48 sts round 2 k instep in pattern and k to end
